front.title: SMTP Service Extensions for Transmission of Large and Binary Message Headers

abstract.t: This memo defines two new service extensions to the SMTP service. Thefirst service enables a SMTP server to indicate the maximum sizeRFC822 header it is willing to accept in a message. The secondenables a SMTP client and server to negotiate the use of 8bit or or8bit encoded binary contents within the message header. This memospecifies the algorithms necessary for the interworking betweenextended clients with a large and binary header and non-extended SMTPservers.
